docs.summary: Returns the index of the current page of results.
description: `currentPage` is a zero-based index of the current page of results, meaning the 1st page is `0`, the 2nd page is `1`, and so on.
If no results match the query, `currentPage` is undefined.

The page size is defined by the [`limit()`](wix-crm-v2.Fields.FieldsQueryBuilder#limit) function and can be retrieved using the [`pageSize`](#pagesize) property. You can use the [`next()`](#next) and [`prev()`](#prev) functions returned by `extendedFields` to navigate the pages of a query result.

examples.title: Get `currentPage` from a query result
Perform a query and get `currentPage` from the result

docs.summary: Returns an array of `extendedFields` items that match the query.
description: `items` contains the current page of results retrieved by the query.
If no results match the query, `items` is an empty array.

The page size is defined by the [`limit()`](wix-crm-v2.Fields.FieldsQueryBuilder#limit) function and can be retrieved using the [`pageSize`](#pagesize) property. You can use the [`next()`](#next) and [`prev()`](#prev) functions returned by `extendedFields` to navigate the pages of a query result.

examples.title: Get `items` from a query result
Perform a query and get `items` from the result
body: // Handle if no matching items found

docs.summary: Returns the number of items in the current page of results.
description: `length` returns just the number of items in the current page, not the total number of items that match the query. For the total number of items that match the query, see [`totalCount`](#totalcount).

The page size is defined by the [`limit()`](wix-crm-v2.Fields.FieldsQueryBuilder#limit) function and can be retrieved using the [`pageSize`](#pagesize) property. You can use the [`next()`](#next) and [`prev()`](#prev) functions returned by `extendedFields` to navigate the pages of a query result.

examples.title: Get `length` from a query result
Perform a query and get `length` from the result

description: `pageSize` returns the page size set in [`limit()`](wix-crm-v2.Fields.FieldsQueryBuilder#limit) in `FieldsQueryBuilder`.

examples.title: Get the query's page size
Perform a query and get `pageSize` from the result

docs.summary: Returns the `FieldsQueryBuilder` object used to get the current results.
description: Use `query` to create and run a new query by chaining additional `FieldsQueryBuilder` functions to it. You can filter only on properties that haven't already been used in the previous `FieldsQueryBuilder`.

examples.title: Get `query` that produced the current result
Perform a query and get `query` from the result

docs.summary: Returns the total number of items that match the query.
description: `totalCount` returns the total number of items that match the query, not just the number of items in the current page. For the number of items in the current page, see [`length`](#length).

examples.title: Get `totalCount` from a query result
Perform a query and get `totalCount` from the result

docs.summary: Returns the total number of pages the query produced.
description: The page size is defined by the [`limit()`](wix-crm-v2.Fields.FieldsQueryBuilder#limit) function and can be retrieved using the [`pageSize`](#pagesize) property. You can use the [`next()`](#next) and [`prev()`](#prev) functions returned by `extendedFields` to navigate the pages of a query result.

examples.title: Get `totalPages` from a query result
Perform a query and get `totalPages` from the result

docs.summary: Indicates whether the query has more results.
description: You can use the [`next()`](#next) and [`prev()`](#prev) functions returned by `extendedFields` to navigate the pages of a query result.

examples.title: Get whether the query has more results
Perform a query and get `hasNext` from the result

docs.summary: Indicates whether the query has previous results.
description: You can use the [`next()`](#next) and [`prev()`](#prev) functions returned by `extendedFields` to navigate the pages of a query result.

examples.title: Get whether the query has previous results
Perform a query and get `hasPrev` from the result

docs.summary: Retrieves the next page of query results.
description: The `next()` function retrieves the next page of query results.

The page size is defined by the [`limit()`](wix-crm-v2.Fields.FieldsQueryBuilder#limit) function and can be retrieved using the [`pageSize`](#pagesize) property. You can use the [`next()`](#next) and [`prev()`](#prev) functions returned by `extendedFields` to navigate the pages of a query result.
If items are added or removed between calls to `next()`, the values returned by `FieldsQueryBuilder` may change.

examples.title: Get `next` from a query result
Perform a query and get `next` from the result
Iterate through all pages of query results

docs.summary: Retrieves the previous page of query results.
description: The `prev()` function retrieves the previous page of query results.

The page size is defined by the [`limit()`](wix-crm-v2.Fields.FieldsQueryBuilder#limit) function and can be retrieved using the [`pageSize`](#pagesize) property. You can use the [`next()`](#next) and [`prev()`](#prev) functions returned by `extendedFields` to navigate the pages of a query result.
If items are added or removed between calls to `prev()`, the values returned may change.

examples.title: Get `prev` from a query result
Perform a query and get `prev` from the result
